title: $:/_/my/styles/css

text:
<% if [tag[PostcardGroup]] %>
<% if [{!!claimed}!match[]] %> !!!! This group has been claimed by {{!!claimed}}. <% else %> !!!! ''Unclaimed''. To claim this group, please reach out to Scott Sauyet: scott@sauyet.com or (860) 335-2869 <% endif %>
Postcard Writer: <% if [{!!claimed}!match[]] %>{{!!claimed}}<% else %>`___________________________________`<% endif %>
''Choose either of these scripts (or mix them up!):''
{{PostcardScripts/AmandaV/1}}
{{PostcardScripts/AmandaV/2}}
<$list filter=[tag[Postcard]!has[draft.of]group{!!group}tag{!!campaign}nsort[seq]]>
NameAddressTownStateZip
<$checkbox tag="done"/>{{!!name}}{{!!street}}{{!!town}}{{!!state}}{{!!zip}}
!!!! Please return to Shannon Louden or Scott Sauyet no later than October 15. <% endif %>
title: $:/_/my/templates/PostcardGroup
